category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 6 (Agenda)
contents: Article 6 (Agenda) Before starting the general meeting, the chairman must prepare the following agenda and post it in the meeting room or prepare it as a handout and issue it to members of the general meeting. 1. Confirmation of quorum and declaration of opening 2. Passage of meeting minutes 3. Reports 4. Matters for deliberation 5. Other matters 6. Declaration of closing of meeting
